result.execSummary:
The defendant Dylan R Wangerin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex with Child Age 16 or Older, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.09.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Early termination of probation after 6 months allowed if deemed by Agent.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

No contact with victim KLV DOB: 11/05/1998, nor her family.
No unsupervised or unmonitored contact with minor females.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.

timeConds.notes: STAYED, for use at Agent's discretion.

charges.descr: Sex with Child Age 16 or Older

Character

Defendant Dylan R Wangerin in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads guilty to count #1.  Court finds the defendant guilty to count #1.  State makes recommendations.  Attorney Wolff makes statements.  Defendant makes statements.  
The Court Orders the Following:
Withheld Sentence:
Term of Probation:1 Year
Conditions of Probation:
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
No contact with the victim KLV DOB: 11/5/98, nor her family.  
No unsupervised or unmonitored contact with minor females.
Condition Time: 10 days STAYED to be used at the Agents discretion.
COSTS:  $243.00 to be paid as a condition of probation
Expunction is conditionally granted upon completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.  
Early termination of probation after 6 months allowed if deemed by agent.
Filed by the State. Witness list attached.
